START_COMMAND: Hi, my name is {NAME} and I am a tool for managing groups with many special functions to be discovered and I am Open Source! If you want to see my source type: /source If you need help, type /help
HELP_COMMAND:
Hi my name is {NAME}
Do You need Help?
GROUP_INFO: Group Title: {NAME} Group Id: {ID} Group's Language: {LANG} Warn Limit: {WARN} Total Group Users: {USER_COUNT} Total Group Messages: {MESSAGE} In the last 30 days
BOT_WELCOME: Thanks for adding me to the group {RED_HEART} Please select your language => [/lang] {SPARKLE} Remember to make me administrator to work properly{RED_EXCLAMATION_MARK} üÜò Need Help? => /help {GEAR} To change the group settings, press the [/settings] command {GEAR} To change the filters in the group, type [/filters] {GEAR} To change the warn limit in the group, type [/setwarn] {GEAR} To change welcome type [/welcome] and follow the instructions My Version is: {VERSION} {VERSION_NAME}
BAN_ERROR: Incorrect command syntax or unrecognized user: {TEXT}
BAN_USER_ERROR: There was a problem with the user ban %s
DELETE_MESSAGE: You must use this command in response to a message!
CLOSE_SETTINGS: You have closed the bot settings menu!
SET_MAIN_WELCOME: Group Welcome Instructions: You have to use the command like this /welcome args where args is the text you need to insert it is possible to use special tags that are interpreted by the bot: {username} = user's username {chat} = group name {first_name} = user's first name {userid} = user id {mention} = user mention HTML tags can also be used b , i, code and emojis can also be used EXAMPLE: Welcome {username} in {chat}
WELCOME_MAIN_HELP_SET: I changed the welcome of the group! if you want help type /welcome without any message
WEATHER_MSG: Current weather in {CITY} Min: {MIN} C¬∞ Max: {MAX} C¬∞ Humidity: {HUMIDITY}% Il The sky is: {SKY}
REPORT_ADMIN_MSG: Reporting done! an admin will take care of your request!
RULES_MSG: You have correctly changed the rules of the group!
RULES_ERROR_MSG: The message is empty! The correct format is: /setrules args
PERM_MSG_ERROR:
The bot does not have the correct permissions to function properly!‚ùå
Please promote the bot as an admin
PERM_MSG_OK: The bot has the correct permissions to function properly ‚úÖ
GLOBAL_REPORT_MSG: You have reported a problem to the bot staff, an available operator will come to assist
ERROR_RESPONSE_USER_MSG: You must use this command in response to a user
WARN_USER: ‚ÄºÔ∏è {USER} was warned! For the {TOT}¬∞ time (su {MAX}). in the {NAME} group [{ID}]
WARN_USER_MAX:
User @{USER} has reached the maximum number
 of warns in the {GROUP} group and has been banned
MUTE_MSG_R: You have removed the mute from user {NAME} [{ID}]
BADWORD_LIST_EMPTY: There is no badword for this group. You can add a badword with the command /badword word
BADWORD_ADD_TEXT: You have entered the forbidden word: [{WORD}] in the database
BADWORD_ADD_EMPTY: You cannot enter an empty forbidden word! the correct format of the command is: /badword banana
SHIELD_ON: {SHIELD} Shield Activated! Attention! By activating this command you have completely blocked the group!!! to change the settings again you have to type /settings
KICKED_USER_MESSAGE_NO_USERNAME: {NO_ENTRY} {USER}, to be welcome in the group, set your own username! Action: {ACTION}
SET_BAN_MESSAGE: You have set up the custom ban message successfully!
BAN_ERROR_SYNTAX: Incorrect command syntax or unrecognized user: {TEXT}
BAN_ERROR_AC: I can't ban an administrator or owner!
BAN_EMPTY_ERROR: The text of the ban cannot be empty!
BAN_SELF_BAN: I can't ban myself, Use this command in the correct way!
SERVER_STATUS_SYSTEM: Server Status: {GEAR} ==== SYSTEM INFO ==== {GEAR} System: {SYSTEM} Node Name: {NODE} Release: {RELEASE} Version: {VERSION} Machine: {MACHINE}
SERVER_STATUS_CPU: {GEAR} ==== CPU INFO ==== {GEAR} Current CPU utilization is: {CPU_PERCENT}% Current Frequency: {CPU_FREQ}Mhz Physical cores: {CORE} Total cores: {CORE_LOGIC}
SERVER_STATUS_DISK: Total Size: {TOTAL} Used: {USED} Free: {FREE} Current Disk_percent is: {PERCENT}%
SERVER_STATUS_NETWORK: {GEAR} ==== NETWORK INFO ==== {GEAR} Total Bytes Sent: {BYTES_SENT} Total Bytes Received: {BYTES_RECV} It's running since {RUNNING}
OPERATOR_JOIN: The bot operator {NAME} has just joined the group
BLOCK_NEW_MEMBER: #Automatic Handler: Kick User for group protection
NEW_MEMBER_WITHOUT_PHOTO: {NAME} set a profile picture! You were kicked for safety!
FILTER_NAME: Non-Latin filter activated for the user {NAME}
BAN_ZOOPHILE: Nebula's automatic system intercepted a zoophile! I banned user {NAME}
SUPERBAN_REPLY: Select a reason for the Superban
SUPERBAN_ERROR: Superban cannot be completed. The user may have already been blacklisted or is on the whitelist.
SUPERBAN_ERROR_NO_ID: Attention you can not superbanned without entering an TelegramID!
SUPERBAN_ERROR_USERNAME: Attention I can not Superbanned this user via Username! use the superban via id example: /s 123456789 and if you want to insert also the reason type as in example: /s 123456789 Reason
SUPERBAN_ERROR_ID: Attention you can not superbanned without entering an valid TelegramID!
SUPERBAN: {NO_PEDESTRIANS} You got Super Banned {ID} via TelegramID {SCROLL} For the following reason: {REASON} {RIGHT_ARROW} Go to: https://squirrel-network.online/knowhere/?q={ID} to search for blacklisted users
SUPERBAN_ALREADY_EXIST: The user {ID} is already present in the database
SUPERBAN_WHITELIST: User {NAME} is whitelisted you cannot blacklist!
SUPERBAN_LOG: {NO_PEDESTRIANS} #Log User Superbanned! {BUST_IN_SILHOUETTE} User: {NAME} [{ID}] {SCROLL} Reason: {REASON} {ONE_O_CLOCK} Datetime: {DATE} {WOMAN_POLICE_OFFICER} Operator: {OPERATOR_NAME} {OPERATOR_USERNAME} [{OPERATOR_ID}]
SUPERBAN_REMOVE: I removed the user with TelegramID: [{ID}] from the database
SUPERBAN_REMOVE_ERROR: Attention this user not super banned!!!
LANG_SELECTED: You have selected the English language for your group
SUPERBAN_MULTI: MultiSuperban executed! of the following ids:
